About Lilyford

Lending a helping hand and bridging the gap

Lilyford foundation is a not-for-profit organisation, non-political and non-governmental organisation that helps people in need and provide opportunities for people to pursue their dreams and lead better lives.

Vision

To provide a helping hand in achieving a poverty, hunger and basic-health-issues free society and to provide succour to the poor and needy in our immediate environment and Africa at large.

Mission

To collaborate with organisations with similar goals to create a healthy living and sustainable environment for the less privilege in society.

To achieve a life of giving and promote the values of integrity and selflessness within our host communities and beyond.

To offer voluntary support and assistance to deserving indigent students to achieve their educational aspirations.

Lilyford focuses on people-oriented programmes and with the help of our beneficiary communities, provide relief for the most pressing community issues. Our values, activities and our belief in helping and uplifting those in need are sacrosanct with the Lilyford founding story.

Our Aims & Objectives

Improve Quality of Life

of people affected by abject poverty, through social programmes to restore their confidence and enable them to live meaningful lives

Improve Access To Education

through educational funds and award of scholarships to deserving indigent students across the primary, secondary and tertiary levels of education

Capacity Building

through empowerment of youths and windows, skills acquisition and engagement of youths in productive ventures that eliminates vices

Improve Healthcare

through provision of health facilities and seasonal health programmes for people without access to quality health care

Provide Self Sustenance

through provision of soft loans for petty trades and small scale business enterprises, to help them manage their future and that of their families.

Eradicate Homelessness

through re-building of degraded and neglected environments and building of shelters for less privileged families and the elderly.

Our Structure

Lilyford Foundationâ€™s team comprises the Board of Directors, Project directors, Membership Coordinators and Volunteers. The Board members provide advisory and strategic direction for Lilyford, while the Project directors and membership coordinators facilitate our numerous outreach and intervention projects. Beneficiary communities are major stakeholders in our operations and are also involved in the decision-making process
